model

Class CashRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CashRegister

  • public class CashRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    CashRegister is coordinates the interaction between the garage and the point of sale. It closes tickets, takes in payments, and keeps logs of the transactions throughout the day
    Author:
    Chris DeMonte, Matt Guidi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CashRegister(UserData activeUser)
      The constructor takes in the active user in the userDataManager, sets the ticket counter to 1, and atempts to load the DailyData for the current day

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeTicket(ParkingLot pL, java.lang.String licensePlate, State s)
      This method closes out an order, opens up a spot in the garage, and completes the transaction
      int getTicketCounter() 
      DailyData getTodaysData() 
      void loadData()
      Reads a dailydata object stored in a file and sets the cashRegister's dailyData.

      Records the when a space is occupied by a new car

      saves the dailyData stored in the cashRegister to a file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CashRegister

        public CashRegister(UserData activeUser)
        The constructor takes in the active user in the userDataManager, sets the ticket counter to 1, and atempts to load the DailyData for the current day
        Parameters:
        activeUser - comes from the UserDataManager

    • Method Detail

      • closeTicket

        public void closeTicket(ParkingLot pL,
                        java.lang.String licensePlate,
                        State s)
        This method closes out an order, opens up a spot in the garage, and completes the transaction
        Parameters:
        pL - is the runtime instance of the parkinglot
        licensePlate - is a string entered by the user
        s - is a state abbreviation entered by the user

      • makeDailyDataEntry

        public void makeDailyDataEntry(int spaceNumber)
        Records the when a space is occupied by a new car
        Parameters:
        spaceNumber - is the space being filled

      • loadData

        public void loadData()
        Reads a dailydata object stored in a file and sets the cashRegister's dailyData. If there is no file a new one is created.

      • saveDailyData

        public void saveDailyData()
        saves the dailyData stored in the cashRegister to a file.

      • getTicketCounter

        public int getTicketCounter()

      • setTicketCounter
